text: وَإِنَّهُۥ لَذِكۡرٞ لَّكَ وَلِقَوۡمِكَۖ وَسَوۡفَ تُسۡـَٔلُونَ

translation.en: And indeed, it is a remembrance for you and your people, and you [all] are going to be questioned
translation.id: Dan sungguh, Alquran itu benar-benar suatu peringatan bagimu dan bagi kaummu, dan kelak kamu akan diminta pertanggungjawaban
